subject: refactor(conventions): remove deduplication section, keep alias rule
body:
The DEDUPLICATION section conflated two concerns: cross-import dedup
(handled by mergeService, not controllable by the AI generating the
file) and within-file dedup (basic AI competence, not worth spelling
out). Removed the section entirely. The one non-obvious case — alias
merging when source data uses multiple names for the same entity —
is now a bullet under TITLES where it logically belongs.

Tags: conventions, naming, cleanup
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 1
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: conventions
Semver: patch

title: remove deduplication section, keep alias rule
